# ApplicationLoadingOverlay

The ApplicationLoadingOverlay is used to render loading overlays within the application.

When mounted, the ApplicationLoadingOverlay will communicate with an ancestor
[ApplicationLoadingOverlayProvider](/application/cerner-terra-application/components/application-loading-overlay-provider) to
present a loading overlay.

> See the [How to Show Loading Overlays](/application/cerner-terra-application/how-to/show-loading-overlays) page for usage information.

## Usage

```jsx
import ApplicationLoadingOverlay from '@cerner/terra-application/lib/application-loading-overlay';
```

<ApplicationLoadingOverlayProps />
